full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 138 of 236 1042 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 THE COURT: Just a moment. 2 GX 298 has been admitted? 3 MS. COMEY: Yes. 4 THE COURT: Without objection, Mr. Everdell? 5 MR. EVERDELL: Without objection. 6 THE COURT: All right. 7 Jurors, you may pick up your binders and look at GX 298. 8 9 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 10 We can play it, please, Ms. Drescher. 11 (Pause) 12 Q. Now, as this is playing, at 46 seconds and continuing, Mr. Parkinson, what part of the search is this video depicting? 13 14 A. This is on the east side of the residence, ground floor, approaching from west to east. 15 16 Q. Is this now the walk-through video that you talked about earlier? 17 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. Now, at 1 minute and 15 seconds, what part of the property are we entering? 20 21 A. We are in the garage -- the three-car garage located on the first floor, east side of the dwelling. 22 23 Q. And now we're at one minute and 55 seconds. Mr. Parkinson, what part of the main residence are we in now? 24 25 A. The ground floor, the south side, and it's relatively in SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012652
